title: Senior Engineer or Assistant Manager Quality Fabrication
jobDescription:
WORK DESCRIPTION:


  • Design, Implement, and improve company Quality standards. (e. g ISO 9001:2015, EN ISO

3834-2,14001 & 45001)

  • Responsible for EN ISO 3834-2:2005, all documentation; traceability (EN ISO 15614-1, EN ISO9606-1, EN IS015609-1)
  • Conducting supplier process audit as per plan and new supplier development.
  • PAP documentation and implementation for New Product Development.
  • Assist to other departments to develop solution and metrics.
  • Responsible for Quality of Machining & fabrication related activities.
  • Handling client inspection & Customer Audit
  • Knowledge of Drawing reading; GD&T Parameters.
  • Knowledge of PFC, PFMEA, Control plan & QAP
  • Knowledge of APQP, PPAP, MSA, 7OC Tools.
  • Responsible for Welder qualification and WPS Qualification as per standard.
  • Knowledge of Parent material grouping system, Welding consumables.
  • Knowledge of welding and allied process like MIG, MAG, TIG, Resistance Welding, MMAW,
    Oxy-Acetylene welding.
  • Knowledge of stainless steel and Mild steel material welding process & material knowledge.
  • Knowledge of Process Audit, Product Audit, Dock Audit and Layout inspection
  • Conducting SPC for better process control online.
  • Customer complaint analysis, taking corrective &; preventive action (CAPA,8D) foreach reported complaint Why analysis.
  • Responsible to improve the skill matrix of inspector, analysis and skill Enhancement of team.


QUALIFICATIONS REQUIRED:


  • - Mechanical Engineer from a reputed institution with minimum first class in the final year.
    - International certified welding engineer or Certified Welding inspector NDT level II
    Should have knowledge and experience of iso systems 90001,18000 and 14000
  • Ready to work in shift timing also.


competencies


  • Knowledge of APQP, PPAP.MSA.SPC
  • NDT Level-ll certification
  • Certified CWC as per EN ISO 14731
  • Working on Lean Manufacturing Project.
  • Performing role as MR.
  • ISO internal Auditor For 9001,14001 & 45001
  • Certified supporting welding coordinator for EN ISO 3834-2 Audit
  • knowledge of Blasting & painting will be advantage.


EXPERIENCE REQUIRED:


5-10 years of experience in fabrication/welding/ Sheetmetal industry

CTC budget 4.5 L to 9.5 L.


PERSONALITY ATTRIBUTES DESIRE


The candidate must have a pleasing personality and a knack of getting around with workers and team members.

The candidate must be a good team leader and should be able to get the best out of his team.

title: Senior Engineer or Assistant Manager Marketing Hi Tech Radiators HO
tagsAndSkills: Sales Strategy,Customer Satisfaction,Business Development,Planning Management,Brand Marketing,Senior,Sales,Marketing management
jobDescription:
Hi Tech Radiators Pvt Ltd

JD Senior Engineer or Assistant Manager Marketing

  • All introduction meeting with the customers to be spear headed for assigned Region for Hi Tech Products.
  • Increase in the overhead earnings of the business and sustain an overhead level of 20%.
  • Ensure the payment follow up is done on a regular basis to keep the business flushed with cash and never enter in a liquidity crunch
  • Guide the marketing team on picking up current orders so that we can maintain a 20% overhead margin.
  • Prepare collection targets monthly
  • Ensure that the customer quotations are replied to in 24 hours.
  • Prepare marketing yearly budget for travel and exhibition purposes.
  • The candidate should have experience in dealing with the utilities, candidate will be responsible for getting Hitech approved in the local utilities as an approved supplier for radiators and tanks for the utilities for assigned region.
  • Candidate should have experience of working in the transformer industry or sheet metal industry or die industry or press industry or heavy fabrication industry or paint or oil and gas industry and selling transformers or sheet metal , fabricated products to the utility industry. Should have a lot of connections with the utility companies the QA person.
  • Manufacturing experience will be added advantage.
  • Experience in Transformer Marketing or Sheet Metal.
  • Good contacts
  • Must build HT profile in the given region so good networking and PR skills.
  • All business transactions should be handled through SAP / ERP system.
  • Experience 3 to 7 years
  • Job description: marketing and sales manager regional.
  • Education: engineer in electrical or mechanical. & business management MBA Marketing.
  • Salary =up to 10 L.
  • Location HO Ghansoli Navi Mumbai.

title: IT Support Executive (Off roll)
jobDescription:
This is a off roll opportunity for IT support role. The incumbent will have following responsibilities:

Query Management:

  • Handle and resolve queries related to POS, CRM, and ERP systems.
  • Provide first-level support and escalate issues to higher-level support as necessary.
  • Ensure timely and effective resolution of queries to maintain smooth operations.

Maintain Query Tracker:

  • Develop and maintain a comprehensive query tracker.
  • Record all queries, their status, and resolution details.
  • Regularly update the query tracker to reflect the latest information.

Ticket Resolution Documentation:

  • Document all ticket resolutions in the system accurately.
  • Ensure all resolutions are detailed and accessible for future reference.
  • Follow up on unresolved tickets to ensure timely closure.

Coordination with Store SPOCs:

  • Serve as the primary point of contact for store SPOCs regarding IT updates.
  • Communicate IT updates and changes to relevant stakeholders in a clear and timely manner.
  • Collaborate with store SPOCs to ensure IT systems are functioning optimally and address any issues promptly.
